content: ***find this pattern as a free download from hobbii on september 1 2023*** inspired by the packed schedules and endless parties of summer the on the go bag is your must-have tote for wherever the day takes you drop the essentials in your bag for an afternoon of running errands a trip to the farmer s market or an impromptu visit to your favorite vintage shop the minimal design and sturdy construction of the on the go bag makes it a timeless piece that will always have a place in your wardrobe **yarn used** hobbii happy place dk weight #3 50% wool 50% cotton 273 yards per 100g skein sample uses the color 35 solid 1065 yards 4 skeins held double throughout join the happy place vip email list for exclusive details deals and giveaways - link 1 1 https //link brands mvk co/ac5f8e7
